studyArms.name: Dapagliflozin 10 mg
studyArms.description: Dapagliflozin 10 mg once daily in addition to background regional standard of care therapy. Dose may be temporarily reduced to 5 mg if clinically indicated.

studyArms.name: Placebo
studyArms.description: Matching placebo once daily in addition to background regional standard of care therapy.

studyCohorts.name: Type 2 Diabetes (T2D)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients with an established diagnosis of type 2 diabetes at randomisation (at least 30% of total population)

studyCohorts.name: Non-Diabetes
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients without an established diagnosis of type 2 diabetes at randomisation (at least 30% of total population)

studyCohorts.name: Echocardiographic Sub-study
studyCohorts.characteristic: A subset of approximately 300-400 patients evaluating changes in cardiac structure and function

arms.name: Dapagliflozin 10 mg
arms.description: Dapagliflozin 10 mg once daily in addition to background regional standard of care therapy. Dose may be temporarily reduced to 5 mg if clinically indicated.

arms.name: Placebo
arms.description: Matching placebo once daily in addition to background regional standard of care therapy.

cohorts.name: Type 2 Diabetes (T2D)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients with an established diagnosis of type 2 diabetes at randomisation (at least 30% of total population)

cohorts.name: Non-Diabetes
cohorts.characteristic: Patients without an established diagnosis of type 2 diabetes at randomisation (at least 30% of total population)

cohorts.name: Echocardiographic Sub-study
cohorts.characteristic: A subset of approximately 300-400 patients evaluating changes in cardiac structure and function

epochs.name: Treatment Period
epochs.description: From Day 0 until Study End Date (SED), including visits at Day 14, 60, 120, 240, and every 4 months thereafter

epochs.name: Study Closure Visit (SCV)
epochs.description: Procedures initiated when 844 primary endpoints are predicted to have occurred
